thumb.description: Believe Itéãã‚†ãæ™‚é–“ã‚’å¿ƒã«åˆ»ã¿ æœªæ¥ã¸ã®é“ã‚’æ¢ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã•ã¾ã‚ˆã„ãªãŒã‚‰ ã“ã®è¶³ã§æ­©ãç¶šã‘ã‚‹è¨˜æ†¶ã®æ¬ ç‰‡ã‚’æ‹¾ã„é›†ã‚ å‘½ã®ç³¸ã§ç¹‹ãèª°ã«ã‚‚è¨€ãˆãªã„ç§˜å¯†ã‚’æŠ±ãˆã¦ã‚‚ æ˜æ—¥ã¸ã®å¸Œæœ›ã‚’èƒ¸ã« é™ã‹ã«æ¯ã‚’å¸ã†é‹å‘½ã¨ã„ã†ãªã‚‰ å—ã‘å…¥ã‚Œã‚ˆã†å…¨ã¦ã‚’åŠ›ã«å¤‰ãˆã¦ å‰ã«é€²ã‚“ã§ã„ãã„ã¤ã‹å¿…ãšå…‰ã®å½“ãŸã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã« è¾¿ã‚Šç€ãã¨ä¿¡ã˜ã¦Amidst the passing crowds, familiar scenery, unchanging days I engrave the time that has passed in my heart, searching for the path to the future I may get lost, but I walk on with these feet I gather up fragments of memories and connect them with the thread of life Happiness and sorrow, everything shapes who I am now Even though I carry a secret that I can't tell anyone, I am still strong I take a quiet breath with hope for tomorrow in my heart If you call it fate, then I will accept it, this flow called destiny I will transform all joy and pain into strength and move forward I believe that one day I will surely reach a place where the light shines I will live with the future I grasp with these hands engraved in my heartMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataMovie : Rebel
